= Model formats used in rtm-ros-robotics =
== Euslisp (xx.l) ==
   Euslisp model format (irteus version) used in Euslisp process. 
   Supported : robots, objects, and scenes
== Collada (xx.dae) ==
   Collada model format used in some ros nodes (such as rviz) and OpenRAVE
   Supported : robots, objects, and scenes
== VRML (xx.wrl) ==
   VRML model format used in OpenHRP3 system. 
   Supported : robots and objects. scenes are supported as Project File (xx.xml)
   Note that OpenHRP3 VRML format differs from webots VRML format. 

= Euslisp (.l) -> Collada model (.dae) =

= Collada model (.dae) -> Euslisp (.l) =
== How to convert ==
=== command line example ===
{{{
rosrun collada_urdf urdf_to_collada `rospack find pr2_mechanism_model`/pr2.urdf pr2.dae # prepare pr2.dae first. 
rosrun euscollada collada2eus pr2.dae pr2.yaml pr2.l.$$.tmp; mv pr2.l.$$.tmp pr2.l
}}}
Input file is pr2.dae. Output file is pr2.l. pr2.yaml is configuration file to define :reset-pose, end-coords, and joint order in euslisp. 
=== using rosmake or make ===
{{{
rosmake hrpsys_ros_bridge_tutorials
}}}
This command generates hrpsys_ros_bridge_tutorials/models/*.l. 
== source codes ==
{{{
`rospack find euscollada`/src/collada2eus.cpp
}}}
= VRML model (.wrl) -> Collada model (.dae) =
== How to convert ==
=== command line example ===
{{{
rosrun openhrp3 export-collada -i `rospack find openhrp3`/share/OpenHRP-3.1/sample/model/sample1.wrl -o /tmp/SampleRobot.dae
}}}
-i is input and -o is output.
To check this file:
{{{
rosrun openrave openrave /tmp/SampleRobot.dae 
}}}
=== using rosmake or make ===
{{{
rosmake hrpsys_ros_bridge_tutorials
}}}
This command generates hrpsys_ros_bridge_tutorials/models/*.dae.
== source codes ==
{{{
`rospack find openhrp3`/build/OpenHRP-3/server/ModelLoader/ColladaWriter.h
`rospack find openhrp3`/build/OpenHRP-3/server/ModelLoader/exportCollada.h
}}}
